section.heading: Approval of disposition of Walter Reed Redevelopment Site.
section.text: Notwithstanding subchapter I of Chapter 8 of Title 10, the Mayor is authorized to dispose of:

para.text: The Walter Reed Redevelopment Site pursuant to the terms of the Term Sheet by ground lease for a term of less than 30 years to Developer;
Portions of the Walter Reed Redevelopment Site by ground lease to the selected public benefit providers and homeless assistance providers;
Portions of the Walter Reed Redevelopment Site in fee simple to Component Developers, the Walter Reed Common Area Association, and the selected homeless assistance providers; and
Portions of the Walter Reed Redevelopment Site by easement to utility providers to the extent necessary for the development of the Horizontal Development and Vertical Development.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2082 of Fiscal Year 2018 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2017 (D.C. Act 22-104, July 20, 2017, 64 DCR 7032).
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2082 of Fiscal Year 2018 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2017 (D.C. Act 22-167, Oct. 24, 2017, 64 DCR 10802).
